mapper.select: SELECT c_code, c_title FROM contents ORDER BY c_code DESC
SELECT c_code, c_title FROM contents WHERE c_code like 'F%' and c_nation='korea' and c_category = '영화' ORDER BY c_code DESC
SELECT c_code, c_title FROM contents WHERE c_code like 'F%' and c_nation!='korea' and c_category = '영화' ORDER BY c_code DESC
SELECT c_code, c_title FROM contents WHERE c_code like 'F%' and c_category!='animation' and c_category = '애니메이션' ORDER BY c_code DESC
SELECT c_code, c_title FROM contents WHERE c_code like 'D%' and c_nation='korea' and c_category = '드라마' ORDER BY c_code DESC
SELECT c_code, c_title FROM contents WHERE c_code like 'D%' and c_nation!='korea' and c_category = '드라마' ORDER BY c_code DESC
SELECT c_code, c_title FROM contents WHERE c_code like 'A%' ORDER BY c_code DESC
SELECT c_code, c_title, c_director, c_genre, c_nation, c_rate, c_synopsis FROM contents WHERE c_code = #{contentsCode}
SELECT c_code, original_file_name, stored_file_path FROM contentsfile WHERE c_code = #{contentsCode}
SELECT c_code, original_file_name, stored_file_path FROM contentsfile
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contents ( c_code, c_category, c_title, c_director, c_genre, c_nation, c_rate, c_synopsis ) VALUES ( #{contentsCode}, #{contentsCategory}, #{contentsTitle}, #{contentsDirector}, #{contentsGenre}, #{contentsNation}, #{contentsRate}, #{contentsSynopsis} )

INSERT ALL
INTO contentsfile ( f_index, c_code, original_file_name, stored_file_path, file_size, created_datetime ) VALUES ( extractvalue(dbms_xmlgen.getxmltype('select cfile_seq.nextval - 1 from dual'),'//text()'), #{item.contentsCode}, #{item.originalFileName}, #{item.storedFilePath}, #{item.fileSize}, sysdate )
mapper.update: UPDATE contents ( c_category, c_title, c_director, c_genre, c_nation, c_rate, c_synopsis ) SET ( #{contentsCategory}, #{contentsTitle}, #{contentsDirector}, #{contentsGenre}, #{contetnsNation}, #{contentsRate}, #{contentsSynopsis} ) WHERE c_code = #{contentsCode}
